2015.notes: Original menu from Wayback Machine showing pho prices at $8.00-$8.50

2025.notes: Current menu showing pho prices at $16.00-$17.00

priceComparison.signatureDish: Pho Dac Biet (Special Beef Noodle Soup)
priceComparison.inflationContext: This 100% increase far exceeds the general inflation rate of ~27% over the same period, highlighting the specific pressures on Vancouver's restaurant industry including rising commercial rents, labor costs, and delivery platform fees.
